00019 shared_ptr<Configurator> Configurator::instance()
00020 {
00021   boost::mutex::scoped_lock sl(singletonLock_);
00022   if (theInstance_.get() == NULL) {
00023     theInstance_.reset(new Configurator());
00024   }
00025   return theInstance_;
00026 }
